props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: render
props.type: (((ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State>) & (ReactElement<...> | ComponentRenderFn<...>)) & ReactElement<...>) | undefined
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: delay
props.description: How long to wait before showing the fallback. Specified in milliseconds.
